name: Monster Feeder GO
description:
A game about feeding your personal monster with trash or goodies.

Watch it evolve, and decide the fate of the world.

Made for a game-jam with the theme: Sustainability.

NOTE: The game was actually intended for mobile devices with GPS signal. In this prototype we selected "Arsenalet" in Viborg, as our starting point. And we used nearby schools as food/trash spawn points.

Created by:

  • Kasper Færch Mikkelsen
  • Jesper Baunsgaard
  • Randy Lillegaard
  • Bettina Ostersen
  • Anders Odgaard
